mutants.code:
def decimal_to_binary(num):
    binary = []
    while num >= 0:
        binary.append(num % 2)
        num //= 2
    binary.reverse()
    return binary

def decimal_to_binary(num):
    binary = []
    while num <= 0:
        binary.append(num % 2)
        num //= 2
    binary.reverse()
    return binary
